title: Girls & Panzer: Shoukai Shimasu!
original_name: ガールズ&パンツァー 紹介します！
ending_song: "Enter Enter MISSION!" by Miho Nishizumi (Mai Fuchigami), Saori Takebe (Ai Kayano), Hana Isuzu (Mami Ozaki), Yukari Akiyama (Ikumi Nakagami), and Mako Reizei (Yuka Iguchi)
sinopse: Specials aired between episodes five and six and episodes ten and eleven, both recapitulation episodes.
